error.vehicle_not_correct: This is not a commercial vehicle!

error.backdoors_not_open: The backdoors of the vehicle aren't open

success.payslip_time: You visited all the shops. It's time for your paycheck!

mission.job_completed: You have completed your route. Please collect your paycheck

info.deliver_to_store: Deliver the box to the store
